commit.message:
add missing GCC13 includes

Closes: #213
Closes: #209

fix null handles in vkDestroy* functions

Fixes https://github.com/DadSchoorse/vkBasalt/issues/205

gnu_symbol_visibility should be hidden by default

Avoids exporting unintended symbols

don't always return VK_INCOMPLETE with multiple effects

Closes: #199

Don't enable VK_KHR_image_format_list for VK 1.2+

We really should have one map per instance but I can't be bothered to rework
that.

fix: Add <algorithm> include. Fixes build on GCC12

https://www.cplusplus.com/reference/algorithm/find_if/

add Debian install instructions

Signed-off-by: Stephan Lachnit <stephanlachnit@debian.org>
search for a queue on vkCreateDevice

commit.message:
Support Meson unity feature (#135)

In simple words: Meson unity feature "combines" many files together and compiles in one step.
Can be activated via `--unity=on` option during project setup.
Also `-Dunity_size=100` (old default), current default IIRC `-Dunity_size=10` (for multi-threading I guess).

STB implementations have switches, which being included with other files just break everything.
So let's compile them as separate targets.

Support Meson unity feature (#135)

In simple words: Meson unity feature "combines" many files together and compiles in one step.
Can be activated via `--unity=on` option during project setup.
Also `-Dunity_size=100` (old default), current default IIRC `-Dunity_size=10` (for multi-threading I guess).

STB implementations have switches, which being included with other files just break everything.
So let's compile them as separate targets.
